summary: This code plays and pauses "sample.mp4" with ffplay for analysis or scene extraction, introducing 3-second delays between playback sessions.

details.comment: This code plays and automatically exits various clips from the sample.mp4 video with specific start times and durations, followed by a 3-second pause between each clip playback.
details.content:
ffplay -ss 00:00:00.000 -t 7.833 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:07.833 -t 6.567 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:14.400 -t 1.467 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:15.867 -t 2.033 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:17.900 -t 3.167 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:21.067 -t 3.2 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:24.267 -t 3.3 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:27.567 -t 3.767 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:31.333 -t 2.067 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:33.400 -t 0.6 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:34.000 -t 3.567 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:37.567 -t 3.167 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:40.733 -t 3.567 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:44.300 -t 6.4 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:50.700 -t 5.667 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:56.366 -t 3.433 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit

details.comment: This code uses ffplay to play predefined segments of a video file "sample.mp4" with specified start and stop times, allowing for analysis or extraction of specific scenes. The sleep commands introduce pauses between each command execution, ensuring the video segment plays before moving on to the next one.
details.content:
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:00:59.800 -t 2.2 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3
ffplay -ss 00:01:02.000 -t 2.9 -i sample.mp4 -autoexit 
sleep 3

details.comment: The code uses the ffplay command to play specific segments of a video file, "sample.mp4", with varying start times and durations. The -autoexit flag ensures that each playback session ends automatically after completion. Sleep commands are used between ffplay calls, introducing delays of 3 seconds each time.
